summary: In a post apocalyptic future, two rival gangs fight for control of Frazier Park by playing "Beat Beat Revelation", a deadly version of Dance, Dance, Revolution(TM).
cast: Jason Trost|Brandon Barrera|Art Hsu|Caitlyn Folley|James DeBello|Bryan Goddard|Lee Valmassy|Nick Principe|Michael Sandow|Rachel Robinson|Natalie Minx|Blayne Weaver|Clifton Collins Jr.|Dov Tiefenbach|Sean Whalen|Kyle Valmassy|Dylan Keenberg|Jeff Howell|James Remar|Dash Mihok
keywords: neo 80s|female nudity|bare breasts|dystopia|based on short film
director: Directors: Brandon Trost (as Trost Bros.), Jason Trost (as Trost Bros.)
title: The FP
